AllowUnauthenticatedIdentities.description: TRUE if the identity pool supports unauthenticated logins.

CognitoIdentityProviders.description: A list representing an Amazon Cognito Identity User Pool and its client ID.

DeveloperProviderName.description: The 'domain' by which Cognito will refer to your users.

IdentityPoolId.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

OpenIdConnectProviderARNs.description: A list of OpendID Connect provider ARNs.

SamlProviderARNs.description: An array of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the SAML provider for your identity pool.

SupportedLoginProviders.description: Optional key:value pairs mapping provider names to provider app IDs.
